TextLibrary.Text: What a surprise! Another metal cog.
What a surprise! Another metal cog.
What a surprise! Another metal cog.
What a surprise! Another metal cog.

I keep tellin' ye lad, that these be no mere metal cogs. The know-how that goes into creatin' a classic piece like this, 'twas lost in the fall o' Drak-Dum, when the Gnolls burned the Great Smithy and...

I keep tellin' ye lad, that these be no mere metal cogs. The know-how that goes into creatin' a classic piece like this, 'twas lost in the fall o' Drak-Dum, when the Gnolls burned the Great Smithy and...

I keep tellin' ye lass, that these be no mere metal cogs. The know-how that goes into creatin' a classic piece like this, 'twas lost in the fall o' Drak-Dum, when the Gnolls burned the Great Smithy and...
